com.yuti.zonebgm.server.handlers

Class ServerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yuti.zonebgm.server.handlers.ServerHandler

  • public class ServerHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to handle server-side events of the mod.

    • Constructor Summary

      ServerHandler()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDeleteZoneRefreshMusic(com.forgeessentials.api.permissions.PermissionEvent.Zone.Delete event)
      Schedules a BGM's refresh for the players in a zone which got deleted.
      void onMusicResourceZoneDeleteGroup(com.forgeessentials.api.permissions.PermissionEvent.Group.Delete event)
      Schedules a BGM's refresh for the players of a group which got deleted.
      void onMusicResourceZoneUpdateGroup(com.forgeessentials.api.permissions.PermissionEvent.Group.ModifyPermission event)
      Schedules a BGM's refresh for the players in a zone which got updated.
      void onMusicResourceZoneUpdateGroupUser(com.forgeessentials.api.permissions.PermissionEvent.User.ModifyGroups event)
      Schedules a BGM's refresh for a player who got their group updated.
      void onMusicResourceZoneUpdatPermissioneUser(com.forgeessentials.api.permissions.PermissionEvent.User.ModifyPermission event)
      Schedules a BGM's refresh for a player who got their permission (for the music in the zone) updated.
      void onPlayerAskForRefresh(com.yuti.regionbgm.server.events.PlayerAskRefreshBgmEvent event)
      Refresh player's BGM when a client asked a refresh (when RegionBGM is reactivated).
      void onPlayerChangeZone(com.forgeessentials.util.events.PlayerChangedZone event)
      Refresh player's BGM when they move into another zone.
      void onRefreshPlayersAfterPermissionUpdate(net.minecraftforge.fml.common.gameevent.TickEvent.ServerTickEvent event)
      Refresh the BGM for the scheduled zones and players

      • onMusicResourceZoneDeleteGroup

        public void onMusicResourceZoneDeleteGroup(com.forgeessentials.api.permissions.PermissionEvent.Group.Delete event)
        Schedules a BGM's refresh for the players of a group which got deleted. It's for the special case where a group have a different BGM in a zone (different that the one of the default group)
        Parameters:
        event -

      • onDeleteZoneRefreshMusic

        public void onDeleteZoneRefreshMusic(com.forgeessentials.api.permissions.PermissionEvent.Zone.Delete event)
        Schedules a BGM's refresh for the players in a zone which got deleted. (stop the music or play the one from the parent zone)
        Parameters:
        event -
